[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/3″ uncode_shortcode_id=”217085″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-prif” heading_semantic=”h1″ text_font=”font-136269″ text_size=”h1″ text_weight=”400″ text_transform=”uppercase” uncode_shortcode_id=”466867″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Studio Team[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text text_lead=”yes” text_color=”color-prif” uncode_shortcode_id=”166360″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-prif” heading_semantic=”h1″ text_font=”font-136269″ text_size=”h1″ text_weight=”400″ text_transform=”uppercase” uncode_shortcode_id=”105617″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Apply now[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text text_lead=”yes” text_color=”color-prif” uncode_shortcode_id=”110958″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

We invite all qualified candidates to submit their CV/Resumes and Portfolios to join our team. Applicants are encouraged to apply for specific positions based on their job preferences and selected titles.
